page.title: 03SHOEWORKER IN HIGHAM FERRERS
page.content:
Gordon gets up at 7am. At 7:30am he goes to work in the Leather Room. It is quiet in there unlike the Clicking Room. It smells but not as bad as the Closing Room. It smells of glue in there and it is not ventilated. Some people ask to leave to get fresh air. Gordon's glad he does not work there.
He works 5 days a week, Monday to Friday from 8am to 5pm. He gets 2 breaks a day for 10 minutes. During that time he can use the food and drinks vending machines. He gets 1 hour for dinner in which he goes home. Bob brings a packed lunch as there is not a cafe.
Gordon likes the shoes, they are not too fashionable but they are a smart shoe.
